meta.description: Context tool command registry. Agents may extend by adding commands, kits, or requests.

index.description: List context files with sizes, dates, and staleness indicators

search.description: Wedge-style term search across context with expansion hints

summarize.description: Generate or retrieve agent-maintained summary at specified depth

trust.description: Report confidence levels and known stale regions

forgive.description: Acknowledge drift, reset baseline without shame

honor.description: Mark something as learned-from, now resting

fear.description: Context rotation and regrounding when path forward is unclear
fear.philosophy: Fear signals loss of contact at the mold/form boundary. Enables perspective rotation to find productive momentum.
